name: Achromic
description:
Have you ever felt like giving up? 

Like everything just feels hopeless, cold, and nobody else can even feel / see the scream within your eyes?

Even if nobody can see the dying fire within your weary soul, I hope you don't give up. I hope that you continue to fight because somehow I know that there's still that cry in your heart that you wanted to live, that you can still endure what shit life will throw you. I know that even if it's painful for you to breathe for another second and you're just so tired of living just for another day, I know you can get through all those shit! I know that you fought so hard to conquer your silent battles! I know that you spent those sleepless nights crying because you felt like you don't know how you'll face everyone and continue to act like you're okay! I know that you can get through it, because you're a fighter. You're a warrior. You understand that those are just life's way of making a strong person out of you, because calm seas don't make a strong captains. Error, failures, disappointment, and pain does.

Artist: Jovierose | 3456 x 2592 | Noir Photographs |
